mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (id, password, email, phone, address, name) VALUES(#{id},#{password},#{email},#{phone},#{address},#{name})
INSERT INTO products (name, price, description,image, category,quantity) VALUES(#{name},#{price},#{description},#{image},#{category},#{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, name, phone, email, address fROM users
SELECT name, price, description, image, category fROM products
